Yes

Heya, I'm Zinzy, and I've been yelling at Internet clouds since 1997.

I'm an IndieWeb enthusiast, and a Design Manager making tools for people at work. I'm a senior-but-silly researcher and designer, and I love to learn new things. Welcome to my website, where I come to link and think.
